name: Bad Apprentice
description:
Zorciar Krildrush the Great, a Wizard of some renown, has tasked you with cleaning the lab, and making sure his familiar Azrael doesn't go messing up his experiments while he is away.

Well, unfortunately Azrael doesn't take orders from a lowly Apprentice like you.

Good luck, Apprentice - you wont be the last.

EARLY EARLY ACCESS.
